name: 剧毒王蝎
description: 沼泽中的致命杀手，一滴毒液就能致命。毒液经过提炼后却能制成珍贵的解毒剂。

features: 深紫色的甲壳闪烁诡异光泽
巨大的钳子滴着腐蚀性液体
尾部的毒刺发出绿色荧光

image_prompts.design: A massive scorpion with dark purple carapace that shimmers eerily. Giant pincers drip corrosive liquid, tail stinger glows green, blood-red eyes. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on carapace plates, ink sketch texture on venom patterns, non-reflective surface with matte dark purple tones, deadly swamp assassin.
